about_the_game:
Tropicalypse is an innovative third- and first-person zombie shooter game set in a lush tropical apocalypse. Featuring a dynamic, changeable story, players can shape the fate of the world as they face hordes of the undead in an immersive survival adventure.

This project is more than just a game; it’s a lifelong skill-testing journey. As the developer, I’ve committed to continually updating and improving Tropicalypse with new features, mechanics, and content, making it a constantly evolving experience. Whether you're exploring the tropical wasteland or fighting for survival, Tropicalypse will grow alongside my passion and skills for game development.
